descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/1nzHJEX.jpg?1[/img][/center][center]
[b][size=5]- Mod Description -[/size]

An lore-friendly and script-free Overhaul of the city of Windhelm.[/b]

[size=5]- Videos - [/size]

[size=4]by Brodual
[youtube]KPUkeNXiS20[/youtube]

by Nozi87
[youtube]-UrPPuIBF9M[/youtube]

by slytra [/size]
[youtube]MkoPfhG9GOg[/youtube]

[size=4]by GamerPoets[/size]
[youtube]uPBU_yRWYh8[/youtube]

[size=4]by Hodilton[/size]
[youtube]FFcCvjG_bzM[/youtube]

[b][size=3]by Thyworm[/size][/b]
[youtube]JJLUvhGwovw[/youtube]

[b][size=5]- Performance -[/size][/b]

[size=3][color=#ff7700]My Rig:[/color] Asus P8B75-M/CSM Motherboard, Intel I7 2600 @ 3.4 GHz
[/size]8 Gb RAM, NVidia GTX 680 2 Gb, running alongside Somber 3 ENB + 1024 Textures and I get [color=#ff7700]40 FPS[/color] average.

[size=5][b]- Installation - [/b][/size]

[size=2]Use NMM to install, simply double-click the mod in the "Mods" tab of NMM after it has finished downloading or [/size][size=2]Download manually and open the .rar file. Place the DATA folder into your SKYRIM folder, click "yes" to merge folders.[/size] Activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.

[b][size=5]- Load Order -[/size][/b]

Setting the right load order for your mods is a crucial step to enjoying a stable modded game. The Load Order Optimisation Tool ([b][color=#ff7700]LOOT[/color][/b]) can help with that, by providing automated load order sorting that's simple to use and fully customisable.
[size=2]
[/size][b][size=5]- Requirements -[/size][/b]

- Skyrim up to date

[b][size=5]- Not Compatible Mods:[/size]

[/b]- Mods that change the city of Windhelm (with the exception of texture mods)
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8058/?]Open Cities[/url] by Arthmoor.

[size=5][b]- Compatible:
[/b][/size]
[color=#6d9eeb][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52612/?]Real Shelter - Full Release[/url][/color] by ThreeTen, patch available at Real Shelter mod page.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43701/?]Dawn of Windhelm[/url]  by BluePianoTwo, compatible version available under optional files.

[b][size=5]- Future Plans -[/size][/b]

add details to the Gray Quarter, small fixes etc.

[size=5][b]- Recommended mods -[/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43701/?]Dawn of Windhelm[/url] by BluePianoTwo
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs[/url] by [b]Kris Takahashi[/b]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36334/?]Inconsequential NPCs[/url] by Ripple[/size]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/?]Expanded Towns and Cities[/url]  by [b]missjennabee
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13429/?]Designs of the Nords[/url] by [b]KEBW1144[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555/?]RS Children Overhaul[/url] by [b]Ranaline[/b]
[/size]

[b]- Credits -
[/b]
ENB used in the screenshots [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?]Somber 3 ENB[/url] by Maeldun0[b][/b][/center]
